evil.label: GOOD VS. EVIL AT MAXIMUM ACCOUNTABILITY

country_risk.algorithm: Risk = Gini×0.3 + Polarization×0.25 + Redistribution×0.2 + Migration×0.15 + UCDP×0.1

method_data.saddle_rule: Saddle when: |v| < 0.15 AND sign(a) opposes sign(v).
method_data.peak_window_rule: Peak year = now_year + weighted_median(Δt_i). Window = [now_year + p10, now_year + p90] (80% window).
limitations: Does NOT predict direction (reform vs punitive) — political capture determines that.
Does NOT predict magnitude of policy response.
Analogue library is US-centric; other countries need local event labels.
Ring B (GSS/Pew) improves confidence when loaded; without it, horizon widens.
